item.description:
Dear Boston Karaoke Meetup Members:

 

  • I am extending April Meeting to 3 hours.
  • We have the Karaoke Lounge reserved just for us from 6-9PM.
  • Please arrive by 6PM to get most out of Meetup

-Phil
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the back in the Karaoke Room or call me at 617-429-6571
item.why: It's really fun... you get to perform in front of a live audience. And you get to listen to old and new friends sing your favorite songs!
item.name: Boston Karaoke Meetup - April 9th, 2011 - Note New Start Time is 6PM
